name: Hobo Santa (FanLoben)
description:
Entry in the "Paint Jam but long this time 2021" game jam.

You are a Hobo Santa and steal presents until the cops arrive.

No win state was implemented, steal until the game is over.

A bit buggy...

Keyboard and Mouse to control

Move with 'WASD' and in 3D look around with 'Mouse'

Action button is either the 'E' key or 'Left Mouse Button'

Credits:

Game by Jonas Eliasson

Cover Art by Ture Moritz

Assets by Stina Moritz
